import React, { useRef } from 'react' import './Modal.css' const Modal = ({ text, onConfirm, onClose, data }) => { const nameRef = useRef(); const descriptionRef = useRef(); const editTaskHandler = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const enteredName = nameRef.current.value const enteredDescription = descriptionRef.current.value const newTask = {'name': enteredName, 'description': enteredDescription} onConfirm(newTask); onClose() } return (

{text}

<> { data ?
:
}
) } export default Modal
